title: Learn about the interpretation of a crocodile in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq, the interpretation of a small crocodile in a dream, and killing a crocodile in a dream.

preview.html: Crocodile in a dream: The crocodile is considered a huge and predatory reptile that harms people, and therefore many people expect that seeing it in a dream is one of the unpleasant visions that do not bode well for the viewer and cause him panic and fear, but we can. He says that the interpretation of his vision varies depending on the social status of the dreamer and the color of the crocodile. The crocodile in a dream by Ibn SirinThe crocodile in a dream The interpretation of the crocodile in a dream indicates that there are enemies waiting for the dreamer and planning to harm him and harm him, and they are often his relatives. If one sees many crocodiles, this indicates That a person has many enemies and he must beware of them. If the dreamer is a merchant, the dream symbolizes how greedy and avaricious he is and that he cheats in his work and trade. Seeing him in a dream is a sign of treachery or treachery, because he is one of the animals with which he has no relation. Seeing If a crocodile drags or drags him into the water and the crocodile kills him, the dream means that he will become prey for thieves and they will be able to rob him and take all his money. A crocodile in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of a crocodile in a dream carries connotations of good and evil. Among the most important interpretations of goodness that occurred in this vision: Seeing eating crocodile meat or skin in a dream shows how intelligent the dreamer is, how strong he is, and that he has the ability to get rid of his enemies and that he will obtain a lot of money. If a person in a dream drags the crocodile to the ground This dream indicates that he will be able to attack those who are waiting for him and who will harm him and harm him. Seeing a crocodile sleeping means that the dreamer will obtain endless money. The evil of what was said in this vision: Seeing it in a dream generally indicates sadness and sorrow that will surround the dreamer and that There is a person around the dreamer who betrays and betrays him. When the dreamer sees that he has turned into a crocodile, the dream indicates that he is a corrupt and immoral person, who commits transgressions and commits great sins. The crocodile in the dream of Imam Al-SadiqSeeing many crocodiles in a dream indicates that there are many enemies who want to harm The dreamer, but they show him the opposite of what they hide. If the dreamer is a person about to travel or to a new job, and he sees a crocodile in his dream, this indicates the obstacles that will stand in his way in achieving his success. Imam Al-Sadiq explained that seeing a crocodile in a dream indicates some negatives. That surrounds the dreamer, such as failure and loss that will befall him. A crocodile that chases a person in a dream indicates that he is a bad person and does many wrong actions and needs to undo them. Seeing him in a dream also indicates the presence of some people who crush the dreamer and speak ill of him. Egyptian website A specialist that includes a team of senior dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. A crocodile in a dream for single people. Seeing a crocodile in a dream of a single woman, who was a student, indicates her fear of exams. If this girl is engaged, the dream symbolizes that she is worried and stressed about her future life and that she will

title: Interpretation of chicken in a dream and buying chicken in a dream

preview.html: The dream of a chicken for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man is either grilled, cooked, boiled or fried chicken, or eating chicken meat, or selling chicks, or buying chicks, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a chicken in a dream. Seeing chickens in a dream means psychological comfort and a happy life. Anyone who sees chickens in a dream and suffers from illness or health problems, the vision is good news that these problems will be overcome and diseases will be treated. Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees chickens in a dream indicates However, there are suitable opportunities for profit and profitable business projects. Interpretation of a chick in a dream. Seeing chicks in a dream means that the dreamer will enjoy a good family and good children who are on the right path. The presence of a chick in a dream indicates that the dreamer will travel soon. Seeing big chicks in a dream means that marriage will definitely be imminent. Interpretation of buying a chick. In a dream, buying chicks in a dream indicates ease of life, success, and earning a large halal income. If the patient sees that he is buying chicks in a dream, the vision indicates that the disease will be overcome and that the stage of complete recovery will arrive soon. Interpretation of selling a chick in a dream. Seeing chicks being sold in a dream means caution and care during the season. NextSelling chicks in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her negligence towards her husband and children. Seeing chicks being sold in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the need to care and take care of the family. Interpretation of eating chicken meat in a dream: Eating chicken meat in a dream indicates a great diet and collecting a lot of money in legal and legitimate ways, God willing. God.Interpretation of seeing grilled chicken in a dream. Whoever sees grilled chicken in a dream, the vision indicates achieving the goals that the dreamer wants.Interpretation of chicks in a dream.Seeing chicks in a dream means a close connection and marriage.Chicks in a dream indicate marriage to a person of great wealth.Interpretation of buying chicks in a dream.Buying chicks in a dream is a sign of success. In the dreamer’s life, a close relationship if he is single, recovery if he is sick, and wealth if he is poor. Interpretation of slaughtering a chicken in a dream Seeing a chicken slaughtered in a dream is one of the good visions that herald the arrival of happy news. Whoever sees the slaughter of a chicken in a dream, the vision indicates the imminent engagement and marriage in The period of the near future.Interpretation of a chicken head in a dream. Seeing a chicken head in a dream indicates the death of someone close to the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing boiled chicken in a dream. Seeing boiled chicken in a dream is considered a sign of positive changes in the dreamer’s life. Whoever dreams of eating boiled chicken, the dream indicates a great profit and a great livelihood. Meat indicates Boiled chicken in a dream indicates a close connection and marriage. Seeing boiled chicken in a dream indicates comfort and stability that the dreamer enjoys, God willing. Interpretation of chicken breast in a dream. Seeing chicken breasts in a dream is a sign of travel. Chicken breasts in a dream is a sign of getting a job. Dreaming about eating chicken breasts means a promotion in the future.

title: Interpretation of eating rice and meat in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: In the following article, the Encyclopedia presents an interpretation of eating rice and meat in a dream for an unmarried woman, at banquets and weddings, and eating them on Eid al-Adha from the Sunnah of our honorable Messenger Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. Blessings.Unmarried women may see meat raw or cooked and may also see rice. Dream interpretation scholars, such as the scholar Ibn Sirin, have made an effort to put together all the interpretations related to this dream in all cases of its vision, which will follow his approach to what we will mention in the following paragraphs of interpretations. Interpretation of eating rice and meat in a dream for a single woman. In the following paragraph we explain to you the different meanings of this dream when seen by a single woman: The vision of an unmarried woman symbolizes the interpretation that she is preparing meat and rice and cooking them to prepare a feast with the coming of happy occasions in her life. For an unmarried woman to eat from a plate. Containing sweet rice and well-cooked pieces of meat in a dream symbolizes that she will receive a lot of blessed sustenance in her next life and it may be in the form of a job that leads to a prestigious position. Cooked white rice in a dream indicates the fulfillment of a desire that he dreamed of and prayed to God for. Interpretation of buying rice in a dream: In the following points we explain the repercussions of buying rice for unmarried women in a dream: To see yourself entering the market to buy rice symbolizes exposure to some hardship and unhappiness, and if the rice is white, this is a sign that God has given him the ability to resist these problems and overcome. She can easily and quickly buy cooked white rice symbolizes comfort after misery and the abundant profit she gets from her work and work. Interpretation of seeing meat in a dream for a single woman: The scholar Ibn Sirin says about seeing meat in a dream with the following interpretations: Eating meat in a dream, and it being raw, symbolizes Illness and some pain, God forbid. Seeing raw meat from the butcher means hearing sad news, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried woman eating raw meat symbolizes her committing an act of sin and exorcism, and it is a warning from God Almighty to hasten to repent and desist from this act. When women buy For unmarried women, cooked meat has a delicious taste, as this indicates the occurrence of happy occasions such as engagement or marriage. Eating tender, cooked pieces of meat indicates that he will get a lot of money without a lot of trouble or fatigue. Thus, in this article, we have provided all the interpretations that It was received by respected dream interpretation scholars regarding the interpretation of eating rice and meat in a dream for a single woman. It should be noted that all of these interpretations are not based on confirmed evidence from the Book of God and the Sunnah of His Holy Prophet, so they should not be taken for granted. To interpret another dream, you can engage in the immediate application of interpretation. Of dreams.

title: Interpretation of hitting a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin: good or bad news?

preview.html: Interpretation of beating a dead person in a dream: Someone you recently lost in a dream is a common and common thing for all of us, and in most cases it is just that you miss this person very much, but sometimes what you see is a source of concern for you. The situation of the deceased in a dream and if he is in good health or feels bad or has something suspicious out of habit, here you need to stand up and remember all the details of the dream because he may have a message that you need to understand. In this article we provide you with an encyclopedia site’s interpretation of beating the dead in a dream. If you are visited in a dream by Kiss a relative or someone you know and you were dying and you started hitting him and getting upset with him. There is no need to be afraid of this dream because it indicates that you will get rid of all your problems soon. This dream describes the punishments in your life that you are very afraid of and you definitely feel disturbed by everything that exists between you and life. Happy and happy life, this dream means that all these problems and punishments will end and you will overcome them. Also, seeing you hitting a dead man in the head with a stick and then making him fall from above. This means that your boss will leave his job soon and you may be next in the job, so get ready. To be Able to assume your new responsibilities, such as the interpretation of beating the dead in a dream and being unable to defend yourself. This means that you will face countless family problems, and you will be greatly affected by them, these problems. You may dream of holidays and separation between members of the same family, so you need To deal with matters in a more rational way. As for someone who sees that the dead person is beating him severely and the dreamer is crying, this is evidence of the seriousness of sin and disobedience. If the dreamer committed it and wants to repent to God or feel remorse for one of the positions or actions that he committed before. And he wants to He corrects what he did, so after seeing this dream, you should not be lazy to correct what you did to atone for your sins.Seeing a dead father beating his daughter in a dreamThe unmarried girl who sees that her father is already dead came to beat her, and this is evidence that this girl is suffering from Many problems caused her to suffocate, but this blow almost showed relief. Interpretation of beating a dead person in a dream, especially seeing a dead father hitting his daughter in a dream. It is a sign of solutions and destruction of worries, because parents are the people who always love us without returning and we have nothing but goodness. Therefore, the father and mother are always afraid On their children and want to see them in the best condition. Therefore, seeing your father beating you is a good sign that will come to you after all the hardships you have gone through. Hopefully an unmarried woman dreams that she is beating her father, then this is evidence that her engagement will not take place. Or if there is someone who will marry her This marriage will not take place, and there will be some problems between him and that person that will end in separation. As for the married woman who sees her father beating her in a dream, this may be a good sign, because she may become pregnant soon, God willing. Also, being beaten by her father is evidence that There is a lot of good that you will gain after going through a period of fatigue and misery. But whoever sees a dead woman beating his children...

title: Interpretation of Tawaf in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Through this article, you can see the interpretation of circumambulation in a dream in different cases. Circumcision represents one of the most important religious ceremonies that Muslims perform when visiting the Sacred House of God, whether during Hajj or Umrah. Which should be seven rounds and is one of the favorite visions of those who dream about it. It is related to seeing the Holy Kaaba, and visiting it is the most important wish that every Muslim dreams of and seeing religious rituals in a dream in general. It is a good vision that indicates goodness, but what are the connotations of the dreamer’s vision of circling the Kaaba? We will learn this through the encyclopedia. Interpretation of Tawaf in a dream: Seeing someone circling the Kaaba in a dream indicates the fulfillment of what the dreamer desires to happen. If the dreamer feels longing during Round, this vision expresses that he performs good deeds in reality. One of the indications of seeing circumambulation around the Kaaba is that it is evidence of the approaching relief and the end of worry, and an indication of the abundance of sustenance and blessing in money. This vision also symbolizes the dreamer’s protection from magic and envy, and it is good news. For the sick dreamer about recovery from his illness. The vision of completing seven circles around the Kaaba indicates a visit to the Sacred House of God to perform the Hajj. If the dreamer sees himself walking around the Kaaba alone, then this vision indicates that the dreamer is going through a crisis that he wishes to end. But if the dreamer sees That the Kaaba is in his house and he saw many people circling around him, then this vision shows the dreamer’s good deeds, which highlights his high status among those around him in reality. Seeing circumambulating in a dream and kissing the Black Stone is a sign of righteousness and piety. As for seeing the Kaaba and looking at it often in The dream is a sign that circumstances have changed for the better. In the event that the Holy Kaaba does not appear during the performance of Hajj, this vision is long for the dreamer and indicates the commission of forbidden acts in reality. Interpretation of the vision of circumambulating the Kaaba in a dream for a single woman: This vision for an unmarried girl symbolizes her short marriage and this The vision also expresses achieving goals in reality. If you see circumambulating the Holy Kaaba at home, then this dream indicates the good behavior that you enjoy. But if an unmarried woman dreams that she is holding the covering of the Kaaba in her hands, then this dream symbolizes purity and concealment. Tawaf in a dream For a married woman: If a married woman sees herself walking around the Kaaba with tears, then this vision promises her good news that she will achieve what she wants in reality. Seeing herself circumambulating the Kaaba by completing the seven circuits is good news for a pregnant woman about her pregnancy, and God knows best. If one sees the Kaaba in the house, then circumambulating it in a dream means goodness. And abundance for her and for all her family members, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about circumambulation in a dream for a pregnant woman. As for the meaning of this vision for a pregnant woman, it is good for her to give birth to a girl, and if she sees that she is praying during circumambulation, then this vision indicates the birth of a male child, and God knows best. This vision also shows the approaching Date of birth. We have presented to you the most important things mentioned in the interpretation of the wanderer in a dream, and at the end of this article we must obtain

title: Interpretation of bees in a dream Seeing bees in a dream

preview.html: The vision of bees for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether she was killed by a sting attack, a board bite, according to Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Sirin, and others. Interpretation of bees in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing bees in a dream is a clear and clear indication of everything that is good and good regarding women. Or children, money, or nutrition in general. Seeing it indicates gaining leadership and losing benefit, and bees appear to the people of the desert and the people of toil and struggle for gain, ownership, collection, and formation. It refers to scholars, jurists, and taxonomists; Because honey is a cure, and the bees were inspired by it and were inspired by its skill and learned its knowledge. Perhaps it refers to the army and soldiers, as it has a prince and a president, and it is a dragon fly, and it has animals and mules. It was said: The bees are human beings, as a fertilized crop that has great benefit, so whoever disturbs a group of bees, or If he takes them, or strikes their stomachs, then he will obtain spoils and money without supplies or trouble. And if an angel sees that he is taking the place of bees, then he will choose for himself a city inhabited by dead permissible income. If he extracts honey from it and does not leave anything for the bees, then he is oppressing them and taking their money. If they gather against him, he will bite him. They work together, and he is harmed by them, and if he kills them, he expels them from this country. Interpretation of bees in a dream according to Nabulsi: They are fruitful and rich in a dream for the one who bought them at a risk, and whoever extracts honey from cows takes money according to Islamic law. And if he takes the honey and leaves nothing for the bees, this is injustice to some, and to the bees. For a soldier, it is evidence of strife. Whoever kills bees wins victory over an enemy, and killing bees is not praised by the peasants, for his life is from him. The bees denote scholars, toil, and contribution, and the bee is a human being, a dangerous habit, a great blessing, a benefit to those who accompany it. And if any angel sees that the bees gather on him and sting him, then he People cooperate, and he is harmed by them, and if he kills bees, he drives them away. Seeing bees means gaining leadership and harming benefit, and bees are a reference to the army of Islam, just as locusts refer to the army of infidels, as well as wasps. Perhaps bees symbolize masters of discovery and reading, see also flies. Interpretation of bees in a dream by Ibn ShaheenPerformed by a person with a mask who has income and a living wage. It is said that bees and their group mean profit and abundant blessings. It is said that he is a beneficial man, and whoever sees that he has caught many bees or taken them, he will be ruined. The bees can be men of the desert and the hunt, or scholars, lawyers, or owners. Types: Whoever dreams of being stung by a bee means that he will obtain lawful money through labor. Whoever sees that he ate bees, then he is saving his money for his family. Whoever dreams that he is killing bees, it is interpreted as a loss equal to his killing. Whoever dreams that he took something from the bees’ homes, then it is interpreted as his injustice to his flock. He did not harm him and upon meeting him with his bite, he explains that the people of his town are working together for him. And they will be harmed by it. Bees are considered a symbol of a useful animal, and when you dream of a bee, it means that you live for others and it also means your confidence in your power and position. Interpretation of bees in one dream: An unmarried woman or an unmarried girl seeing bees in a dream is a sign of safety, security, or Friends or company

title: Harassment in a dream is good news for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing harassment in a dream is good news for an unmarried girl. When a single girl dreams of being mistreated in a dream, she begins to think, is the vision good or bad? If the girl dreams that someone is mistreating her while she is sleeping, this is an indication that she heard bad news that caused her Great sadness, and God knows best. An unmarried girl who dreams of harassment in general in a dream. This means that she met a young man and became involved with him without her family’s knowledge, which made her feel guilty. Seeing harassment in a dream indicates an unmarried girl. Until the dreamer commits a great sin and is ashamed of God Almighty. And God knows best. When an unmarried girl dreams that someone is mistreating her, and she was very afraid of him in the dream, this dream means that she feels extreme fear and anxiety in her real life. As for an unmarried girl who dreams of a young man, she does not know that he is harassing her. It is a sign of her bad reputation. People are talking bad about her, because of her bad behavior, and here the vision warns her. The girl who sees herself being harassed runs away from him in a dream. It is a sign of freedom from anxiety and depression, and a sense of peace and comfort. In the case of an unmarried girl who saw a young man she knows harassing her in a dream. It is a symbolic story that he is a dishonest person and she must end her relationship with him as soon as possible. To see harassment in the dream of an unmarried girl, symbolizes the sins and sins that she has committed in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing escape in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing harassment in a dream for a married woman. Seeing harassment In a dream for a married woman, it indicates corruption, harm, and bad things in her life with her husband. As for a married woman who dreams of a man whom she does not know is mistreating her, she was happy about it and was convinced of that. It is a metaphor for her hatred for her husband, her failure to preserve his honor, and his betrayal in reality. A married woman is going through a period Sadness due to a financial crisis, and she saw herself running away from a harasser in a dream. This indicates comfort, eliminating anxiety, and improving their financial circumstances. As for a married woman who sees in her dream a man she knows trying to harass her, this means that he is really uncomfortable with this person and expects bad from him. And if A married woman dreams of being harassed repeatedly in a dream. It is a metaphor for her distance from God, the Almighty and the Most High, and she must get closer to Him and leave the comforts of this world. As for a married woman who dreams of a stranger harassing her, it is a sign that the dreamer is lying, misbehaving, and speaking wrongly about Others. As for someone who dreams of a mahram abusing her, this means that she will face a serious calamity or someone from her family will be affected. If a married woman sees that her father is trying to harass her in a dream, this means that she does not feel stable or comfortable with her husband, and is thinking about divorcing him. And God knows best. Interpretation of seeing harassment by a man in a dream and its meaning. When a man sees that he is harassing a woman in a dream, it is clear evidence of neglect of religion and distance from obedience and attachment to the teachings of religion. Seeing harassment in a man’s dream symbolizes turmoil and lack of respect.

title: Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from another person

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from another person When we see blood in a dream coming from another person, we immediately feel anxious and afraid. There is no doubt that seeing blood is scary in reality because it indicates harm, but it is known that the dream differs from reality, which means that what we see in our dreams is disturbing and could be good news. The truth, so we must understand the interpretations of our esteemed scholars about the dream, and is it good or is there a problem or experience that the dreamer is going through in his life? Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from another person Seeing blood in a dream coming from another person is a sign of kindness and the near end of crises Especially if the dreamer is happy in his sleep and does not seem to be harmed, and if the one from whom the blood is gushing is a small child, this does not express evil, but rather is an indication of the end of crises and problems in his life.. The dreamer and his arrival in all his dreams soon. The vision is an expression of abundance. Goodness, the approach to relief and livelihood, and getting rid of distress and harm, and the vision is also a warning of the need to be patient with distress and stay away from everything that angers God Almighty. The dreamer lives safely and in good health, far from any evil or evil, and we find that the dream foretells the dreamer to pay off debts and obtain a profitable job as quickly as possible. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from another person by Ibn Sirini. Our respected Sheikh Ibn Shirin explains to us that seeing blood in a dream Coming from another person means that this person is going through an annoying problem that needs help from his relatives and friends, so the dreamer must have the man cooperate with him so that he can get out of his problems and worries, and then live with stability and reassurance. We find that the dream explains the necessity of repentance from all sins and disobedience. Through constant search for forgiveness and prayer, he must also beware of the secrets he hides, as there are those who seek to reveal them in various ways. Watch out for his company and try to solve the problems that arise during this period... patience and calm. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from another person to one person. Seeing blood in a dream coming from another person to one person varies depending on how close the person is. If this person is her friend The dreamer must pay complete attention to her, and not trust her blindly, but rather watch every word that comes out of her. Not only that, but she must choose her friends and not reveal her secrets. In front of someone, regardless of the degree of kinship. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from another person for a married woman. Seeing blood in a dream coming from another person for a married woman is one of the happy and promising dreams in which it is salvation from the problems and disagreements that the dreamer has experienced with her husband for a long time. If the dreamer is looking for For a job or job, she will be able to find the appropriate job that fulfills her ambitions and frees her from any financial harm in the coming period, and this will make her get rid of all debts and problems. She lives a happy and luxurious life with her husband and children, a husband who makes her overcome all worries and judgments with respect and faces them with happiness and joy. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from another person for pregnant women. Interpreters believe that the interpretation of seeing blood in a dream is

title: Interpretation of a dream about cancer by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cancerIt is known that Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about cancer is one of the most important interpretations relied upon by subsequent dream interpretation scholars, due to the accuracy of this great scholar’s ​​interpretation.Interpretation of a dream about dead people with cancer by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about cancerIbn Sirin said about the interpretation of a dream about cancer for someone who died, with different interpretations explained by the siteVariousLess: Ibn Sirin says They will see that when a person sees someone, whether he is a first-degree relative, a distant relative, or even his neighbor who has suffered from a chronic disease such as cancer, this indicates that the deceased has debts. It is not paid before his death. This dream may indicate that the deceased died as a result of a great sin, as the matter varies depending on the degree and seriousness of his illness. In this case, the family of the deceased must be asked whether he has debts or not. It was also mentioned that if the deceased had debts, his family must pay them. ; Because this matter leads to his imprisonment from entering Paradise. As for the interpretation of a dream about cancer for the deceased who did not have God’s hand before his death, the family must pay charity on his behalf. It is worth noting that the great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, and Imam Al-Sadiq have unanimously agreed To see a person in a dream that he has cancer, and this topic is not evil, but rather evidence of goodness and good health, as the vision varies according to the condition of its owner. Interpretation of a woman’s dream of breast cancer. There are many interpretations that scientists have come up with when they see a woman suffering from breast cancer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. Among these interpretations are the following: If a woman dreams of being diagnosed with breast cancer, this means that she is an overly emotional woman and enjoys the love of others for her. Seeing cancer in a dream means that the dreamer is a social personality, he loves life and clings to it. Interpretation of a dream about abdominal cancer in Dream: Many scholars have interpreted a person’s vision of abdominal cancer in his dream with many different interpretations. When we see cancer in a dream, this means that there are many disorders and psychological problems that a person can face with the vision, but this is normal, as we all face such problems in Our life, which is a temporary and visionary stage. Just as a person passes by himself when he is afflicted with the disease, this indicates that he passes peacefully and is not followed by worries or sorrows. Scientists interpreted seeing a person in a dream as having cancer in his stomach, whether the infection was in the colon, liver, or viscera, and this is evidence that the dreamer has a sense of Sensitive because he is affected by those around him, whether the dreamer is a man or a woman, this indicates that he is usually a secretive person who does not reveal to anyone what is happening inside him, which causes him many psychological problems. In another interpretation, he said that when a person dreams that he has abdominal cancer, This vision is a warning to a person not to think too much about things and not to burden himself with sorrows that he cannot bear. It exhausts his body and makes him sick. Interpretation of seeing lung cancer in a dream. Scientists’ article on the interpretation of a dream about lung cancer has various interpretations, including the following: Seeing someone suffering from cancer.

Scientists interpreted seeing a person in a dream as having cancer in his stomach, whether the infection was in the colon, liver, or viscera, and this is evidence that the dreamer has a sense of Sensitive because he is affected by those around him, whether the dreamer is a man or a woman, this indicates that he is usually a secretive person who does not reveal to anyone what is happening inside him, which causes him many psychological problems. In another interpretation, he said that when a person dreams that he has abdominal cancer, This vision is a warning to a person not to think too much about things and not to burden himself with sorrows that he cannot bear. It exhausts his body and makes him sick. Interpretation of seeing lung cancer in a dream.
